conbody.p: The PCO should always consider the needs of the offeror as well as the ability of the government to accommodate when selecting the debriefing location. Just as important is the inclusion of the right personnel in the debriefing process. Therefore, all reasonable efforts should be made to ensure key individuals from distant locations can participate.

For face-to-face debriefings, the PCO shall ensure that all access and security requirements for offerors and government personnel attendance are met. This may include requirements to access the installation or debriefing facility.
